attributes.additional_details: I feel that the TV licence should be scraped, because the BBC used to be unbiased but if fortunately over the last few years they have become more and more left wing and just want to bash the Conservative government, and if they want to take this line then I would prefer they did it without my money.
attributes.background: Scrap the TV licence and they are not impartial.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300118
